description: A path traversal vulnerability in Tridium Niagara AX Versions 3.8 and prior and Niagara 4 systems Versions 4.4 and prior installed on Microsoft Windows Systems can be exploited by leveraging valid platform (administrator) credentials.

product.name: Niagara AX Framework and Niagara 4 Framework

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Niagara AX Framework Versions 3.8 and prior and Niagara 4 Framework Versions 4.4 and prior
